text: Club de Fútbol Unión Viera is a Spanish football team based in Las Palmas, in the autonomous community of Canary Islands. Founded in 1962, it plays in Tercera División – Group 12, holding home matches at Estadio Pepe Gonçalvez. == History == In the 2017-18 season the club finished 2nd in the Regional Preferente Canarias
